title: Show HN: TextQuery – Query CSV, JSON, XLSX Files with SQL
summary: TextQuery is a tool that allows users to query CSV, JSON, and XLSX files using SQL. The app is designed to be user-friendly and easy to use, with a clean and intuitive interface. The app is available for Windows, macOS, and Linux, and can be used to analyze large amounts of data quickly and efficiently. The app is designed to be a one-time purchase, with free updates for the major version. The app is designed to be a desktop-first app, with a focus on providing a well-designed GUI that makes it easy to analyze data. The app is designed to be a powerful tool for data analysts and other professionals who need to analyze large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.
